short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn vocabulary while watching YouTube videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WordWiz: Expand Your Vocabulary While Enjoying YouTube!

WordWiz is the ultimate companion for language learners who love watching YouTube videos. Seamlessly integrated into your browsing experience, WordWiz enhances your language skills by providing quizzes based on the words you encounter while watching videos. It's a fun and interactive way to learn new vocabulary!

With WordWiz, you can effortlessly navigate the language barrier by instantly accessing translations of YouTube video captions. Say goodbye to struggling with unfamiliar words - simply hover over the caption, and WordWiz will reveal its translation, making learning a breeze.

Keep track of your progress and stay motivated with WordWiz's dashboard. Monitor your quiz performance, track the number of words you've learned, and set personal goals. Achieving fluency has never been easier!
